# Square Root of 1/2

> [Square root][@stdlib/math/base/special/sqrt] of `1/2`.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var SQRT_HALF = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-sqrt-half' );
```

#### SQRT_HALF

[Square root][@stdlib/math/base/special/sqrt] of `1/2`.

``` javascript
SQRT_HALF === 0.7071067811865476;
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->


<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var SQRT_HALF = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-sqrt-half' );

console.log( SQRT_HALF );
// => 0.7071067811865476
```

</section>
